buildCommand: npm run check-env && npm run build

headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline' https://js.clerk.dev https://clerk.dev https://zoom.us https://source.zoom.us https://www.googletagmanager.com https://www.google-analytics.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; connect-src 'self' https://api.clerk.dev https://clerk.dev https://zoom.us https://api.zoom.us https://supabase.co https://*.supabase.co https://www.google-analytics.com; frame-src 'self' https://zoom.us https://source.zoom.us; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self';
